intro: Get ready for a crazy adventure with our little friends to find the hidden puzzles scattered around the world!
description:
Discover new words and learn foreign languages in a fast, easy and fun way!

Features:
★ Difficulty levels for beginners, intermediate and experts!
★ Over 1000 words to solve!
★ Enjoyable, smart designed interface
★ Interactive graphics and sounds for even more fun!

Puzzles languages:
★ Dutch
★ English
★ French
★ German
★ Italian
★ Portuguese
★ Polish
★ Spanish
★ Swedish

Categories:
★ Animals
★ Occupations
★ Food
★ Zodiac signs
★ Sea animals
... and many more coming soon!
